title: Rewrite Memory Bank tone and content
description: Current docs are too technical/formal. Need Q&A with Alex to understand: target audience, desired tone (conversational vs formal), content scope (comprehensive vs essential), and specific pain points to address. Then rewrite for clarity and accessibility.

title: Add CI/CD examples for plugin testing
description: Show how to test plugin in GitHub Actions or GitLab CI

title: Document plugin architecture and usage patterns
description: Create comprehensive memory-bank documentation showing plugin structure, agent usage, and team adoption workflow

title: Verify integrity between issues.jsonl and database
description: Related to plugin-nuz. After fixing auto-flush hook, need to verify data integrity: 1) Compare issue count (db vs jsonl), 2) Verify all fields match (id, status, priority, description), 3) Check for orphaned issues in either location, 4) Document expected sync behavior and how to detect/fix inconsistencies. Create test script for ongoing integrity checks.

title: Investigate bd sync flush hook failures
description: Git commits failing with 'Error: Failed to flush bd changes to JSONL'. Appears bd git hooks are trying to auto-sync on commit. Need to: 1) Check .git/hooks/ for bd hooks, 2) Understand auto-flush behavior, 3) Determine if this is expected or misconfigured, 4) Document proper workflow or fix hook. Workaround: use --no-verify for now.
